arts.ttl: Lyon leaves it late to beat 10-man Marseille 1-0 in the French league
arts.sum: Lyon finally prevailed in a 1-0 win over 10-man Marseille thanks to a late own-goal from Leonardo Balerdi in the French league on Sunday. Paris FC celebrated its first win since clinching promotion as it defeated visiting Metz 3-2 in a game watched by Red Bull head of global soccer Jürgen Klopp .

arts.ttl: PLAYER RATINGS | Lyon 1-0 Marseille: Šulc strikes late as 10-man OM fall in fiery Olympico
arts.sum: Olympique Lyonnais got their revenge in the Olympico against a 10-man Marseille with a 1-0 win thanks to a late winner scrambled home by Pavel Šulc. Les Gones have now…

arts.ttl: Marseille predicted XI v Lyon: Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang to start
arts.sum: Roberto De Zerbi is set to name a strong side to face Olympique Lyonnais in Sunday night’s Choc des Olympiques. Olympique de Marseille are, however, without a couple of key players. There…

arts.ttl: Lyon predicted XI v Marseille: Tyler Morton in, Georges Mikautadze out as Villarreal transfer nears
arts.sum: Lyon host Marseille this Sunday at Groupama Stadium for a mouth-watering Choc des Olympiques to conclude Ligue 1’s third matchday. Paulo Fonseca’s Les Gones have the opportunity to pile the pressure on Marseille and…
